Class StitchRouteState

  • java.lang.Object
    • interactive.InteractiveState
      • interactive.RouteState
        • interactive.StitchRouteState

  • public class StitchRouteState
extends RouteState
    State for interactive routing by adding corners with the left mouse button.

    $Id: $Id
    Author:
